<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Automatic IP Addition to Port</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/ports/{ports_id}/automatic_add_ips"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Automatically add IPs to the specified port in VPS.
